Reviews.Title: Good phone, but can't upgrade Windows Phone OS
Reviews.Author: Marc
Reviews.Content: I actually like the phone.  It's very fast and doesn't freeze up unless I'm messing around with a bunch of apps at the same time.  It has a feature to close all open apps at once which is handy.  I love the touch screen and the camera is awesome.  The business card reader works great and adds the card info to your contacts.  The main problem is that Microsoft does not support Windows Mobile version 6.5 anymore and the phone can not be upgraded to Windows Mobile version 7.  You can't use any of the online or PC tools that are available with version 7.  Basically the only way to get files on and off the phone is to connect via USB then cut and paste.  The 8 GB "My Storage" folder is great to store music/videos/docs or whatever, but all the programs are preinstalled on the smaller memory on the phone and there is no way to move them to the "My Storage" folder.  I think I may have to return this phone simply because of the discontinued operating system.  I want to know I can get support if I need it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Omnia II 2 I920 Touch Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Shadow Hunter
Reviews.Content: This phone works great on the pageplus system-a lot of functions-the no contract pay as you go makes it a very affordable phone for the kids!Excellent graphics and very easy to use.5 star rating!

Reviews.Title: I am liking this phone more each day
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain
Reviews.Content: Coming from an easy OS like Android, this phone seems a bit daunting to use. Though if you are average intelligence or better, it will grow on you like a fine cheese. The operating system starts becoming like second nature, but takes quite a bit to get used to. There are MANY functions that are intricate, so if you are computer Savvy you may really appreciate it. If you want something simple, this is not the phone for you. Get an Iphone or Android. Overall I really like it. We didn't want to be under contract, so I bought one of these and a palm pixi plus to activate on teh Page Plus system. Overall both great phones without contract. Fully operational on the Verizon network under the Page Plus. We cut our cell phone bills from $129 a month to $42 after all taxes and fees with these phones. Can't be happier and this one is mine.

Reviews.Title: so far so good.
Reviews.Author: Walter
Reviews.Content: recieved my samsung omnia 2 I920 touch screen with 3g. so far its pretty cool phone. a little slow but then again i have had worse phones. im enjoying playin with the phone atm so many things and options this phone has. im very happy with how good the touchscreen is.

Reviews.Title: fantastic
Reviews.Author: whit whit
Reviews.Content: this item was very good i really love my new phone when i thought it didn work they were very helpful in gettin me some assistance i strongly  recommend them

Reviews.Title: Worst Phone Ever
Reviews.Author: Maro Shin
Reviews.Content: Got this phone in March 2012 because my LG Cosmos Touch stopped working. I got this phone and things were great for the first two months, then that's when things started to happen. First, I noticed I had to restart my phone about 1-4 times depending on my phones mood. Second, the phone would freeze and sometimes I had to wait 5 minutes just to open up the main menu. Around August, I had to send the phone back because it stopped working completely, and I got a refurbished one. Worked great until a week later. Same problems, same things. Now, my haptic feedback (vibration) is all gone. So I'm missing text messages and phone calls and I don't notice them until 5 hours later.Pros: Very nice camera/video quality. I feel like I almost have a Nikon or a Kodak in my hands. Decent call quality. Good battery life (I'm out from 8am and I don't charge it until 2am) so enough to last the whole day.Cons: Slow and glitchy at a lot of times, Opera Browser is slower than I thought, IE is way worse, and all the other things I said up there

Reviews.Title: pleasant
Reviews.Author: rjkklassen
Reviews.Content: the seller is amazing and so is the phone. i got it for my wife and she loves it no complaints at all. the seller is very generous. my phone that i got from got shattered. and he is giving me another one i appreciate that. i love my phone as well great seller great phone

Reviews.Title: Samsung Omnia II
Reviews.Author: RW73
Reviews.Content: Great phone with nice features.  Works great with Page Plus.  The wi-fi feature is a plus.  This is my first "smart phone".  Could care less about getting the internet on my phone but for the price, this phone is nice.  Best of all, you can make phone calls with it and text!  Nice camera also.

Reviews.Title: Broken
Reviews.Author: Payden McBride
Reviews.Content: I was so excited for a new phone, especially a smart phone, When I received it however it wouldnt work with the internet and it kept crashing, It may  have been the phone I got but I was not amused.

Reviews.Title: So-so phone with nice connectivity
Reviews.Author: cindylou2
Reviews.Content: When I got this phone last year, I was ecstatic and thought it was a great improvement over virgin mobile's LG-Optimus-V. Connectivity is still good, but after a year I'm ready for a better pay-as-you-go phone.  The initial lack of intuitiveness was a bit annoying--also later, I noticed that its kind of slow and I still don't use all the features which I don't need anyway.  How slow is it?  I didn't really notice until I measured the timing of receiving and sending the same mail against the Optimus, which I keep as a backup. For a phone with a weak, frustrating connectivity, the Optimus sends and receives faster and is more intuitive than the Samsung.  The best thing about the Samsung is that it uses Verizon's 3G network so you don't have to be near a window or run outside in your underwear to get a signal like with the Optimus.

Reviews.Title: It did not work
Reviews.Author: Ana C. da Silva
Reviews.Content: I got this phone after I read all the other reviews and I wanted a nice phone without contract. The phone itself is fine, but when I went to active a number the phone was not compatible with the no contract network. i had to return the phone.

Reviews.Title: It was okay...
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to get this phone, and it worked fine for a few days.  After about a week, it got super slow, the internet wouldn't load properly, and the backlight would dim after a few seconds.  The seller was great, though!  I'd definitely buy something through this seller again, just not this phone.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG
Reviews.Author: Wes
Reviews.Content: I HAVE BEEN USING AN IPHONE AND GOT USED TO IT. I DON'T FEEL THIS PARTICULAR PHONE IS COMPARABLE TO THE IPHONE THAT I HAVE USED IN THE PAST.

Reviews.Title: Not easy to use
Reviews.Author: akg47
Reviews.Content: Appears to be typical windows bloatware. Just a whole bunch of useless software.Nearly impossible to use with fingers. Always hitting surrounding button. Almost always need to use stylus.Not intuitive. I am impatient, I like things to work by familiarity.Like getting into a car and having to look for the starter, the wipers etc..Pretty looking though.

Reviews.Title: Had this phone for a year already and deffinately not worth it
Reviews.Author: Hernandez
Reviews.Content: the phone is super slow and uncoordinated. ive had this phone for over a year now and trust me other phones are better then this! the phone lags, does not connect to the internet right, and sooooo much more im done with this phone i have the money to buy a Droid so deffinately  hitting this one with a bat

Reviews.Title: My Review
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Purchased this product for my daughter.  First of all Verizon does not really support this product any longer, so trying to get help with anything is like pulling teeth from Verizon since they no longer sell this phone themselves.  If you are getting this phone just to make phone calls and send text messages it's great.  If you are trying to download apps and do other things with this phone, then this is not the phone for you.  This is a Window's based phone, which is not very much with the program like Android, iphone, etc.  I had to go re-purchase a current Verizon phone in order to download apps and get all the full usage out of the phone I needed.  So again, for calling it is good, texting fine, anything else don't waste your time and money.

Reviews.Title: Bluetooth transfers not to be found
Reviews.Author: Elio
Reviews.Content: i got this phone 2 weeks ago.so far , i like it.but there's one thing i can figure out: i have transfered (via Bluetooth) phone numbers that was stored in my old phone to this Omnia but can't seem to find them.i know it was transfered,cause i heard the Omnia beep every time something was tranfered.can someone help me with that....thank you

Reviews.Title: Freeze phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Ivy"
Reviews.Content: I didn't really like this phone that much. The back cover feels like cheap plastic. The phone was constantly freezing up on me so I had to pop the battery and getting it going again. It was somewhat slow on the internet also.

Reviews.Title: Like it so far good!
Reviews.Author: Maria R
Reviews.Content: I like the look of this phone, I activated it myself, It was easy to use and understand, I'll have my husband use this cellphone. Hopefully will last a long time.

Reviews.Title: Not Pleased
Reviews.Author: Mother
Reviews.Content: Not happy with the product. I was suppose to of gotten a new phone and it was not. There was someone else's stuff in the phone, and it freezes quite often. To make a phone call you have to click on the person's name then wait before it will call that person. Very slow to do anything on the phone. Just very fustrated.

Reviews.Title: So-so
Reviews.Author: theoharrafamily
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Omnia II that I purchased is very out of date, and there are no updates for it. It would be a great phone for a child but for the things I need to accomplish with it, business, schooling, and networking, it just isn't designed for all that anymore. I can't even connect with verizon on it, can't sync my contacts, and there is no way to back up any of my data on the phone because of how out of date it is! I wish that in the product description it had stated that it was made in 2009.

Reviews.Title: misleading
Reviews.Author: red
Reviews.Content: I give this review one star only b/c when I tried to activate this phone Verizon told me that this phone has to be on a contract.  So if the seller would let that be known then they would've gotten five stars! But if they let that be known they wouldn't sell many phones huh! Lol

Reviews.Title: THIS IS NOT A PREPAID PHONE
Reviews.Author: David B
Reviews.Content: As advertised " No Contract" is not prepaid... contacted Verizon. The No Contract, is you supplied the equipment therefor you do not have to have a 2 year contract... Verizon has no smartphones for prepaid... Don't be fooled by the "no contract" and think it means prepaid...

Reviews.Title: Cheated off but awesome phone
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I really liked the phone but the seller basically tried to cheat me off. I ordered this phone about 1-2 months ago and I had to send it back because there was a big major issue with this phone. The phone had been scanned or whatever.. but the thing was that I was basically sharing a phone number with someone else no matter how much I tried to change my number. Other than that I love this phone and I had to buy it from Verizon because the seller sold me a rip off.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: D.M.F
Reviews.Content: all the things in this order went as a giftthey are verry happy.they were giver to a friends daugther as hers was going out.so i gave it to her sooner then planed.she loves it

Reviews.Title: nothing short of a nightnare
Reviews.Author: Erica G.
Reviews.Content: This phone is horrible Even programming the speed disl is difficult.  When I checked my email it was displayed as though the phone is not really designed for that purpose. Since I did not intend to use it for that purpose I decided to try it a little longer However after I couldn't get the GPS to work I gave up.  The only thing I had any confidence in was its function ss a phone. That fell apart shen I was programming the speed dial snd it kept dialing the last number I called. As you can imagine it was beginning to be annoying. Save yourself the headache. Save your friends the headache. Get something else

Reviews.Title: ABOUT THIS PHONE!!!
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: Hi I really don't wanna put this phone down, as i'm sure you do wanna know about a phone before you buy it!!But coming from someone you don't know and don't trust there words, as my step daughter has this phone and i seen her charge it at night and it had a full charge within 2 1/2 hours it died on her, she purchased new battery and brought the whole phone back 2 times, And new battery!!! It does not keep a full charge at all it dont matter how long you use it for or text on it, you could use it for 5 mins through out the day it still dies so i reconmand not to buy this phone at all.... as she is currently buying a new phone she said droids are the best phones that she has ever bought and she loves them!!!

Reviews.Title: Help
Reviews.Author: Boris Ruiz
Reviews.Content: Dont this phone got a front Camera as well beside the back camera???? 4those who has this phone do u really like it??? Also like it say no contract is it use like a prepaid phone like Metro PCS????

Reviews.Title: The verizon phone works with chip?
Reviews.Author: Jcamacho77
Reviews.Content: I live in Costa Rica & I would like to know if this phone has a place fotr chip 3g?
